subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Houston quarterback Brian Hoyer was knocked out of the game with a concussion, so T.J. Yates took over in the third quarter and threw a 22-yard touchdown pass to DeAndre Hopkins to give the Texans a 10-6 victory.
snippet: Houston quarterback Brian Hoyer was knocked out of the game with a concussion, so T.J. Yates took over in the third quarter and threw a 22-yard touchdown pass to DeAndre Hopkins to give the Texans a 10-6 victory.
